author: dildick
body:
#### PR description:

This PR moves the ALCT/CLCT trigger patterns defined in `CSCAnodeLCTProcessor` and `CSCCathodeLCTProcessor` to a new class `CSCPatternBank`. It is done in preparation for changes to the CLCT trigger patterns which is anticipated to happen sometime during Run-3. This PR should be integrated after https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27956. The relevant commit is in fact https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/commit/46c1fe3bed502ff8d301cac85ff156440fbb62a3. 

#### PR validation:

I ran the matrix test 20434.0 successfully.

@tahuang1991
title: Move CSC local trigger patterns to pattern bank
